name: CATSSETE
description:
Save Catsette, a tiny little cat that lives inside a cassette.

Help Catsette dodge the perils rewinding and forwarding the tape.

A short video game made for the Brackeys Jam 2020.2.

The Jam theme was REWIND. 

So the first thing come to my mind that you can rewind is a cassette (from the 80's and early 90's, remember?). Also i use a cat to made the word pun CATssete.

This is the first  videogame I have made in my life. It  was a fun experience and I hope to made some more for uncoming jams.

CONTROLS

SCROLL  UP  - SPEED UP

SCROLL DOWN -  SPEED  DOWN

Note:  I tried  to upload the game in WebGL to be played on  browser,  but Ican make the backward audio to play in that version.  So, you have to download the  game in order to play it. Sorry.
